description.input_directory: Directory containing TUG CSV files (001-left_ankle.csv, etc.)
description.output_directory: Directory where processed recordings will be saved
description.sampling_rate_hz: Expected sampling rate in Hz (used to generate timestamps)
description.run_analysis: Whether to run step detection analysis automatically
description.gui_compatibility: If true: creates GUI-compatible folder structure with sensor pairs. If false: simple structure with individual sensor files
description.sensor_location_params_file: JSON file containing step detection parameters optimized for sensor locations

file_format_info.naming_convention: XXX-sensor_location.csv where XXX is recording ID (001, 002, etc.)

gui_compatibility_false.description: Simple structure with individual sensor files

data_conversion.magnetometer: Set to zeros (not available in TUG data)
data_conversion.missing_sensors: Filled with zeros if sensor file not found
